Class Client

java.lang.Object
entities.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:

public class Client extends Object implements Entity

    • emptyBasket

      public void emptyBasket()
      Replaces the current basket with an empty one. Only to be used if the articles aren't returning to the shop's stock.

    • print

      public void print(String prefix)
      Prints the client's info with the received prefix. If the basket isn't empty it will print the products. NOTE: In this case,the storage is the amount in the basket
      Specified by:
      print in interface Entity
      Parameters:
